# Weather Observation Services ## Request for Proposal (RFP) ### Tender Details | **Field** | **Value** | | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Title (English/French)** | Weather Observation Services at Aeroport La Grande IV Weather Station
Services d’observations météorologiques à la station météo de l’aéroport La Grande IV | | **Reference Number** | cb-7602-53591589 | | **Solicitation Number** | 5000068407 | | **Publication Date** | 2023-07-26 | | **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-09-05T 15:00:00 | | **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2023-11-01 | | **Expected Contract End Date** | 2024-10-31 | ### Tender Overview The Government of Canada, through Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is seeking proposals for Weather Observation Services at Aeroport La Grande IV Weather Station in Quebec. The contract period spans November 1, 2023, to October 31, 2024, with optional renewal periods of up to three years. ECCC operates a network of aerological observer stations across Canada, collecting and processing atmospheric data for international and domestic weather forecasting purposes. The selected bidder will be responsible for delivering high-quality weather observations, met expect AT outputs, at the Aeroport La Grande IV Weather Station. ### Key Requirements * Deliver high-quality weather observations, including temperature, humidity, and standard atmospheric pressure levels * Provide automatic sounding equipment and data transmission to the Canadian Meteorological Centre * Share data internationally for global weather monitoring and forecasting * Interact with ECCC staff and other stakeholders as required ### Evaluation Criteria The evaluation of proposals will be based on a Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. ### Contact Information For questions or clarifications, please contact: Angelina Garcia Email: [Angelina.Garcia@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Angelina.Garcia@ec.gc.ca) Phone: (778) 726-1680 Address: #101 – 401 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, V6C 3R2, Canada ### Supporting Documents The complete solicitation, including the Statement of Work, can be downloaded from [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadab
